description:
The schema simply doesn't include security_groups:
nova/api/openstack/compute/schemas/v1.1/server.rng
title: RelaxNG schema is missing security_groups element for server create

comments.content:
The schema simply doesn't include security_groups:
nova/api/openstack/compute/schemas/v1.1/server.rng
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~justin-fathomdb

comments.content: Nova is in v2 API now and there are no RNG schemas for v2. So marking this as won't fix.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v
